appdesc.message: 侦测并警告那些非法分发模组的站点。
appdesc.description: The description of the extension as it appears when searching in Chrome Web Store.

why.message: 此站点已被 $HOMEPAGE$ 阻止，因为它位于我们的列表中并且可能会损害您的计算机。
why.description: Describes why this popup showed up

report.description: Report False-Positive button to report sites which shouldn't be on the list

open.description: Open anyways button to open the site anyways

footer.message: Your Privacy is important to us. We do not collect personal data like your browsing history. For any questions or inquiries, contact us via $EMAIL$ or chat with us on $DISCORD$.
footer.description: A bit of information at the end of the popup to inform the user about privacy and how they can contact us
